sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <AddGroup xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">${wsUsername}</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">${wsPassword}</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">${company}</company> <!-- nillable--> <group xsi:type="m:SoapGroupParameter"> <active xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${active}</active> <allowDuplicates xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${allowDuplicates}</allowDuplicates> <!-- nillable--> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">${description}</description> <externallyOwned xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${externallyOwned}</externallyOwned> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">${name}</name> <observedByAll xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${observedByAll}</observedByAll> <!-- nillable--> <observers xsi:type="m:SoapObserverList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <observer xsi:type="m:SoapObserver"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">${observerName}</name> </observer> </observers> <!-- nillable--> <site xsi:type="xsd:string">${site}</site> <!-- nillable--> <supervisors xsi:type="m:SoapSupervisorList"> ${supervisors} </supervisors> <!-- nillable--> <timeZone xsi:type="xsd:string">${timezone}</timeZone> <useDefaultDevices xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${useDefaultDevices}</useDefaultDevices> </group> </AddGroup> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
